attributes.description: this vehicles is in Excellent condition, Well cared for, a vehicle deserving of your money. * We give good discount on cash buyer! * Free delivery ensured around gauteng province only. * Also we give 24hrs turnaround period for fund candidates and same time conveyance on money bargains. You can call, sms, Whatsapp,Email any of our friendly sales team for more information. Working hours Mon-Fri 8:30am- - 5:00pm Sat 8:30am-2:00pm. You can visit us at 471 Louis Botha Ave, highland north Johannesburg, 2091,We also give full tank on our cars.

attributes.description: At KIA Diepriver we pride ourselves on delivering quality Pre-Owned vehicles. All our vehicles undergo a Dekra Condition Report and a quality check at our workshop for that peace of mind motoring. The one thing we pride ourselves in more than anything is EXCELLENT CUSTOMER SERVICE. Come and join our KIA Diep River Family where trust and service are our main focus. We will tailor make a package that will suit your needs. We deal through all major financial institutions and always pride ourselves on giving you the best deal. CALL NOW and one of our experienced and professional Sales Executives will gladly bring the vehicle out to you or welcome you with a warm cup of coffee at our Dealership.

attributes.description:
At Kia Alberton, we pride ourselves on delivering high quality pre-owned vehicles. All our vehicles undergo a thorough 125-point quality check, roadworthy and valet.  

The one thing we pride ourselves in more than anything is EXCELLENT CUSTOMER SERVICE. When buying a vehicle from us, you join the Kia Alberton Family and family look after each other. We will structure a package that will not only suit your needs but your pocket too.   

Call now and one of our experienced Sales Executives will gladly bring the vehicle out to you or welcome you to our showroom to view and test drive the vehicle. 

Finance can be arranged through all major financial institutions, nationwide delivery available and all trade-ins accepted subject to view. Price excludes on the road fees.
